be.belgium.eid.security
Class Certificate

java.lang.Object
  be.belgium.eid.security.Certificate
All Implemented Interfaces:
SmartCardReadable, Verifiable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthenticationCertificate, CACertificate, HardCodedRootCertificate, RNCertificate, RootCertificate, SignatureCertificate
public abstract class Certificate
extends java.lang.Object
implements Verifiable, SmartCardReadable

The certificate class is an abstract class for the different kinds of certificates stored on the smart card. Certificates can be used for verifying whether the data stored on a smart card matches the certificates by means of authorization.

Version:
1.0.0 12 Feb 2008
Author:
Kristof Overdulve
